There are legitimate ways to fix virus infections, such as using antivirus software, running malware scans, and seeking help from professional IT experts. If your computer has been infected with a virus, I recommend seeking assistance from a reputable computer repair service or IT professional. It's important to prioritize cybersecurity and abide by ethical and legal standards when dealing with computer-related issues.
